cmd_voice_waiting_description: 為您的臨時頻道創建等待室，需要經過請求才能加入
cmd_voice_block_description: 被封鎖的使用者將無法看見您的臨時頻道
cmd_voice_claim_description: 申請此臨時頻道的所有權
cmd_voice_info_description: 獲得有關臨時頻道的訊息
cmd_voice_invite_description: 送出私訊邀請加入您的臨時頻道
cmd_voice_kick_description: 從您的臨時頻道踢除使用者
cmd_voice_limit_description: 更改您的臨時頻道使用人數上限
cmd_voice_name_description: 更改您的臨時頻道標題
cmd_voice_privacy_description: 鎖定或隱藏您的臨時頻道
cmd_voice_region_description: 更換您的語音頻道地區
cmd_voice_thread_description: 為您的臨時頻道創建一個子文字討論串
cmd_voice_transfer_description: 轉移您的臨時頻道所有權給另一個使用者
cmd_voice_trust_description: 信任的玩家將永遠可以加入您的臨時頻道
cmd_voice_unblock_description: 解除封鎖的玩家將可以加入您的臨時頻道
cmd_voice_untrust_description: 解除信任的玩家將可以加入您的臨時頻道
cmd_voice_users_description: 顯示您臨時頻道的信任和封鎖的玩家清單
cmd_voice_password_description: 為您的臨時頻道設定密碼
cmd_voice_reset_description: 將您的臨時頻道設定恢復預設
cmd_voice_lfp_description: Send an invite link to your temporary channel in this chat
cmd_join_description: 使用密碼加入臨時語音頻道
cmd_help_description: Get help with the TempVoice Discord Bot
cmd_find_description: Find out which voice channel a user is in
info_setup:
## **設定完成!**
 {val1} 現在可以在您的伺服器創建臨時語音頻道
info_setup2:
## **設定完成!**
 此 [快速設定介面]({val1}) 現在可以在您的伺服器管理臨時語音頻道
info_reset:
## **恢復預設值**
 所有設定已還原為預設值.
error_validated:
## **無效**
 {val1} 請聯絡管理員，因為高級會員訂閱降級或取消，此頻道創造器不再有效
error_ownerless:
## **無法完成**
 {val1} 臨時頻道沒有所有者且無法被管理
error_empty:
## **無法完成**
 沒有使用者可供您選擇
error_setup:
## **No Creators Found**
 This Bot has not been set up yet. If you are an admin, use </setup:921000495877877762>.
error_manage:
## **缺少權限**
 您需要 **伺服器管理者** 權限才能使用此命令
error_vote:
## **尚未開放**
 此命令可以經由 [投票](<https://top.gg/bot/762217899355013120/vote>)暫時解鎖,或通過 [付費訂閱](<https://tempvoice.xyz/premium>)永久解鎖
error_target:
## **無法完成**
 您不能對所選擇的使用者使用此命令
error_ownership:
## **無法完成**
 只有頻道所有者可以使用此命令，如果頻道所有者已經離開，可使用 </voice claim:921416747687489568>取得頻道所有權
error_permissions:
## **缺少權限**
 沒有此項的權限: {val1}
error_permissions_sync:
## **Missing Permissions.**
 Please contact an Admin. The following permissions are **missing** in the **server settings** role for TempVoice: {val1} in order to sync permissions.
error_deactivated:
## **無法完成**
 此命令對 {val1} 的所有臨時語音頻道都禁用
error_limit:
## **無法完成**
 一個伺服器能擁有 {val1}個臨時頻道創造器，請嘗試刪除一些或是透過 [付費訂閱](<https://tempvoice.xyz/premium>) 獲得
error_ratelimit:
## **慢一點!**
 此命令可在 **{val1}**後使用
error_creation:
## **慢一點!**
 您可在 **{val1}**後創建新頻道
error_webhook:
## **Not Possible!**
 It is not possible to create a webhook because another discord bot is preventing me from doing so. See if security bots like *Wick*, *Beemo* etc. are to blame.
error_totallimit:
## **Not Possible!**
 The limit of **{val1}** temporary voice channels at the same time has been reached, because this Discord server has limited them. Please try again later.
error_discordlimit:
## **Not Possible!**
 All available categories have reached their limit of 50 channels each. If you are an admin, you can set up more **Fallback Categories** in the dashboard, otherwise please try again later.
error_cb:
## **Not Possible!**
 You are trying to use a [TempVoice Custom Branding](https://tempvoice.xyz/) bot on a Discord server, where the owner of the bot has not enabled TempVoice Premium. If you are the owner of this Custom Branding bot, activate it here: **https://tempvoice.xyz/premium** > **Activate Premium**.
error_conflict:
## **Unexpected Conflict.**
 TempVoice had a conflict with Discord's API. Report this message here https://discord.gg/tempvoice. 
### Error: `{val1}`

interface_description: 此 **設定介面** 可以管理臨時語音頻道. 更多選項可使用 **/voice** 開頭的命令
interface_footer: 請按下面的按鈕使用此介面
privacy_menu_description_1: 只有被信任的使用者能夠加入您的語音頻道
privacy_menu_description_2: 所有人都能加入您的語音頻道
privacy_menu_description_3: 只有被信任的使用者能夠看見您的語音頻道
privacy_menu_description_4: 所有人都能看見您的語音頻道
privacy_menu_description_5: 只有信任的使用者能夠在您的頻道打字
privacy_menu_description_6: 所有人都能夠在您的頻道打字
waiting_menu_description_1: 使用者將移動到您的語音頻道
waiting_menu_description_2: 使用者將被踢出且封鎖
did_you_know_1: You can set a password for your temporary channel using '/voice password'.
did_you_know_2: If you cannot find your friend, you can use '/find' to find their voice channel.
did_you_know_3: 'lfp' in '/voice lfp' stands for Looking For People.
did_you_know_4: You can trust up to 25 users with '/voice trust'.
did_you_know_5: You can block up to 25 users with '/voice block'.
did_you_know_6: To text with users on your temporary channel, you can create a private temporary thread using '/voice thread'.
did_you_know_7: To accept or deny requests to join your locked temporary channel, you can create a waiting room with '/voice waiting
